## devLabel variable

Returns `CSSObject` containing provided `label`<!-- -->, but only in development.

**Signature:**

```typescript
devLabel: (label: string) => CSSObject | null
```

## Remarks

Emotion’s `css` prop transform doesn’t strip manually added `label`<!-- -->s in prod, so we should use this utility to avoid long (and potentially CPU expensive?) generated `className`<!-- -->s in production.
